title: Mataji Devaki Ma’s reply on sisters/brothers
text:
Once when the Sudhama sisters went to Sannadhi street house, Bhagavan asked them how many sisters they had. Mataji Devaki Ma said with pride, all are my brothers and sisters. That is how Mataji wanted to live her life. Bhagavan saw Ma her intently and then became silent. One by one spiritual ministry continued. Then Bhagavan started talking about Ma’s family and he enquired how many brothers/ sisters does Ma have.Ma told the number of borthers and sisters she had in the family. Ma realised that how when you have the thoughts of family occupy the mind and act as a hindrance for the higher ambitions of life.
Please visit this link for the satsang.

title: Dr. Kanagavel Rajan’s dispute over investment in bakery shop with his sister
text:
Dr. Kanagavel’s Rajan and her sister’s had a dispute over Bakery shop investment. Bhagavan asked Dr. Kanagavel Rajan if he knew about evolution. Dr. Kanagavel Rajan started explaining about Evolution and mutation. As Bhagavan asked him to explain with example. He explained mutation with what happened in UK in 19th century to the butterfiles due to industrial revolution. As Dr. Kanagavel Rajan was explaining this mutation, Bhagavan said this beggar wants that kind of a sudden change in you.
Please visit this link for the satsang.
